options.title: -a, --algorithm=TYPE
options.description: select the digest type to use. See DIGEST below.

options.title: -a, --algorithm=TYPE
options.description: select the digest type to use. See DIGEST below.

options.title: -c, --check
options.description: read checksums from the FILEs and check them

options.title: -c, --check
options.description: read checksums from the FILEs and check them

options.title: -l, --length=BITS
options.description:
digest length in bits; must not exceed the max for the blake2 algorithm
      and must be a multiple of 8

options.title: -l, --length=BITS
options.description:
digest length in bits; must not exceed the max for the blake2 algorithm
      and must be a multiple of 8

options.title: --untagged
options.description: create a reversed style checksum, without digest type

options.title: -z, --zero
options.description:
end each output line with NUL, not newline, and disable file name
    escaping

options.title: -z, --zero
options.description:
end each output line with NUL, not newline, and disable file name
    escaping

options.title: --ignore-missing
options.description: don't fail or report status for missing files

options.title: --quiet
options.description: don't print OK for each successfully verified file

options.title: --status
options.description: don't output anything, status code shows success

options.title: --strict
options.description: exit non-zero for improperly formatted checksum lines

options.title: -w, --warn
options.description: warn about improperly formatted checksum lines

options.title: -w, --warn
options.description: warn about improperly formatted checksum lines
